sqlMap.select:
select seg_id segId, seg_name segName, (SELECT d.cep_name from main_data d,main_data_type t WHERE t.mdt_cd=d.mdt_cd and t.tenant_id=#tenantId# and d.tenant_id=#tenantId# and t.mdt_sign='TimeSegDef_DateMode' and d.cep_values=DATE_MODE) dateMode, (SELECT d.cep_name from main_data d,main_data_type t WHERE t.mdt_cd=d.mdt_cd and t.tenant_id=#tenantId# and d.tenant_id=#tenantId# and t.mdt_sign='TimeSegDef_TimeMode' and d.cep_values=TIME_MODE) timeMode, DESCRIPTION description, STATUS_CD statusCd, STATUS_DATE statusDate, CREATE_DATE createDate, version version, MAINTAIN_TYPE maintainType , tenant_id tenantId , OPERATE_CODE operateCode from TIME_SEG_DEF where status_cd = 1000
seg_id=#segId# SOURCE_TYPE=#sourceType# (seg_name like concat('%',#segNameOrId#,'%') or seg_id like concat('%',#segNameOrId#,'%')) DATE_MODE = #dateMode# TIME_MODE = #timeMode# org_id = #org_id# tenant_id=#tenantId# OPERATE_CODE=#operateCode#
order by seg_id desc limit #pro_mysql#,#page_record#

select count(1) from TIME_SEG_DEF where status_cd = 1000
seg_id=#segId# SOURCE_TYPE=#sourceType# (seg_name like concat('%',#segNameOrId#,'%') or seg_id like concat('%',#segNameOrId#,'%')) DATE_MODE = #dateMode# TIME_MODE = #timeMode# org_id = #org_id# tenant_id=#tenantId# OPERATE_CODE=#operateCode#
sqlMap.update:
update TIME_SEG_DEF set version=utc_timestamp(),status_date=utc_timestamp()
SEG_NAME=#segName# DATE_MODE=#dateMode# TIME_MODE=#timeMode# description=#description# STATUS_CD=#statusCd# tenant_id=#tenantId# OPERATE_CODE=#operateCode#
where seg_id = #segId#
tenant_id=#tenantId# OPERATE_CODE=#operateCode#
sqlMap.select: select a.SEG_ID segId, a.START_DATE startDate, a.START_TIME startTime, a.END_DATE endDate, a.END_TIME endTime, a.CREATE_DATE createDate, a.VERSION version, a.STATUS_CD statusCd, a.STATUS_DATE statusDate, a.tenant_id tenantId, a.OPERATE_CODE operateCode from TIME_SEG_DTL a where status_cd = 1000 and a.SEG_ID=#segId# and tenant_id=#tenantId#
sqlMap.update:
update TIME_SEG_DTL set version = utc_timestamp() ,STATUS_DATE = utc_timestamp()
START_DATE=#startDate# START_TIME=#startTime# END_DATE=#endDate# END_TIME=#endTime# STATUS_CD=#statusCd# tenant_id=#tenantId# OPERATE_CODE=#operateCode#
where time_seg_dtl_id=#timeSegDtlId#
tenant_id=#tenantId# OPERATE_CODE=#operateCode#
sqlMap.delete: delete from TIME_SEG_DTL where seg_id =#segId# and tenant_id=#tenantId#
delete from TIME_SEG_DEF where seg_id =#segId# and tenant_id=#tenantId#
sqlMap.select: select count(1) from DISCOUNT_PRICE where seg_id = #segId# and tenant_id=#tenantId#

select op_id opId, name opName, DESCRIPTION description, STATUS_CD statusCd, STATUS_DATE statusDate, CREATE_DATE createDate, longitude longitude, latitude latitude, version version , tenant_id tenantId, OPERATE_CODE operateCode from RS_SYS_CELL_DEF where status_cd = 1000
OP_ID=#opId# (op_id like concat('%',#opNameOrOpId#,'%') or name like concat('%',#opNameOrOpId#,'%')) (op_id like concat('%',#nameOrId#,'%') or name like concat('%',#nameOrId#,'%'))
12756274*asin(Sqrt(power(sin((#lat#-latitude)*0.008726646),2) + Cos(#lat#*0.0174533)*Cos(latitude*0.0174533)*power(sin((#lng#-longitude)*0.008726646),2)))<=#radius#
tenant_id=#tenantId# OPERATE_CODE=#operateCode#
order by op_id desc limit #pro_mysql#,#page_record#

select op_id opId, name opName, DESCRIPTION description, STATUS_CD statusCd, STATUS_DATE statusDate, CREATE_DATE createDate, longitude longitude, latitude latitude, version version , tenant_id tenantId, OPERATE_CODE operateCode from RS_SYS_CELL_DEF where status_cd = 1000 and OP_ID in
#defaultValue[]#
tenant_id=#tenantId# OPERATE_CODE=#operateCode#
order by op_id desc

select count(1) from RS_SYS_CELL_DEF where status_cd = 1000
OP_ID=#opId# (op_id like concat('%',#opNameOrOpId#,'%') or name like concat('%',#opNameOrOpId#,'%')) tenant_id=#tenantId# OPERATE_CODE=#operateCode#
sqlMap.update:
update PRICING_PLAN_ATTR set STATUS_DATE = utc_timestamp()
DEFAULT_VALUE=#defaultValue# DEFAULT_VALUE_NAME=#defaultValueName# SEQ_ID=#seqId# STATUS_CD=#statusCd# tenant_id=#tenantId#
PRICING_PLAN_ATTR_ID=#pricingPlanAttrId# PRICING_INFO_ID=#pricingInfoId# ATTR_SPEC_ID=#attrSpecId# tenant_id=#tenantId#
sqlMap.select:
select p.PRICING_PLAN_ATTR_ID pricingPlanAttrId, p.PRICING_INFO_ID pricingInfoId, p.ATTR_SPEC_ID attrSpecId, p.DEFAULT_VALUE defaultValue, p.DEFAULT_VALUE_NAME defaultValueName, p.STATUS_CD statusCd, p.SEQ_ID seqId, a.CHOOSE_URL chooseURL, a.PAGE_IN_TYPE pageInType , a.ATTR_SPEC_NAME attrSpecName , a.ATTR_SPEC_DESC attrSpecDesc , p.tenant_id from PRICING_PLAN_ATTR p,ATTR_SPEC a where p.status_cd = 10 and p.ATTR_SPEC_ID = a.ATTR_SPEC_ID and p.tenant_id=#tenantId# and a.tenant_id=#tenantId#
p.PRICING_PLAN_ATTR_ID=#pricingPlanAttrId# p.PRICING_INFO_ID=#pricingInfoId# p.ATTR_SPEC_ID=#attrSpecId#
order by p.PRICING_PLAN_ATTR_ID desc

select p.PRICE_PLAN_ID pricePlanId, p.HALF_CYCLE_FLAG halfCycleFlag, p.CYCLE_UNIT cycleUnit, p.CYCLE_TYPE cycleType, p.CYCLE_SYNC_FLAG cycleSyncFlag, p.SUB_EFFECT_MODE subEffectMode, p.SUB_DELAY_UNIT subDelayUnit, p.SUB_DELAY_CYCLE subDelayCycle, p.UNSUB_EFFECT_MODE unSubEffectMode , p.UNSUB_DELAY_UNIT unSubDelayUnit , p.UNSUB_DELAY_CYCLE unSubDelayCycle, p.VALID_UNIT validUnit, p.VALID_TYPE vaildType, p.FIXED_EXPIRE_DATE fixedExpireDate, p.MODIFY_DATE modifyDate, p.STATUS_CD statusCd, p.tenant_id tenantId
from PRICE_PLAN_LIFECYCLE p where p.status_cd = 10
p.PRICE_PLAN_ID=#pricePlanId# p.tenant_id=#tenantId#
sqlMap.update:
update PRICE_PLAN_LIFECYCLE set STATUS_DATE = utc_timestamp()
CYCLE_UNIT=#cycleUnit# CYCLE_TYPE=#cycleType# CYCLE_SYNC_FLAG=#cycleSyncFlag# SUB_EFFECT_MODE=#subEffectMode# SUB_DELAY_UNIT=#subDelayUnit# SUB_DELAY_CYCLE=#subDelayCycle# VALID_UNIT=#validUnit# VALID_TYPE=#vaildType# STATUS_CD=#statusCd# FIXED_EXPIRE_DATE=#fixedExpireDate# tenant_id=#tenantId#
PRICE_PLAN_ID=#pricePlanId# tenant_id=#tenantId#
